已公告資料.標案名稱: 101年度設備維護保養暨垃圾吊車操作技術服務

1.是否為中小企業: 否，預估分包予中小企業之金額 15,260,000 元

英文公告.標案名稱: Invitation to tender technical service of facilities maintenance and operation of cranes in 2012 for refuse incineration factory belonging to Southern District Waste Management Plant,Environmental Protection Bureau,Kaohsiung City Government.
英文公告.廠商地址: 臺北市士林區中山北路6段89號10樓
英文公告.附加說明: The Plant consists of 4 incineration furnaces which can incinerate 450 ton wastes each stoke per day , 4 steam boilers which work at about 500 psi under 400℃ with 64 ton steam generating and necessary auxiliary systems such as induced fan、forced fan、second forced fan、feeder water pump、condenser pump、air condenser cooler system、flue gas treatment system such as semi-dry scrubber、activated carbon system、bag filter and chain conveyor for fly ash .

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.97機關名稱：高雄市政府
決標資料.附加說明: 本案係以政府採購法第22條第1項第9款辦理之勞務採購，採評選方式遴選出優勝廠商後議價後決標。因本案採固定金額，故評選出優勝廠商後係與序位名次第1之廠商議內容後決標。
